description:
Founded in 2012, Master of Project Academy taught 50,000+ IT & Business professionals in more than 170 countries around the world.

Now, Master of Project Academy's exclusive & premium courses are in Udemy!

You can find several ITIL Foundation Trainings, but you cannot find Realistic ITIL Foundation Exams to check your readiness!

  • More than 2,000 students took this exam to check their readiness for REAL Exam.
  • Course Completion Certificate is provided
  • 12+ Hours of Comprehensive Content
  • 10 ITIL Realistic Exams with solutions and explanations.
  • Includes 400 meticulously selected ITIL Foundation questions.

Note that, this course provides:

  • Lifetime access
  • 30 Days FULL REFUND of your money is guaranteed if you will not be satisfied of this course

By enrolling in this course, you will be able to:

  • Assess your readiness for ITIL Foundation Exam with 10 FULL REALISTIC ITIL Foundation Exams
  • Identify your weaknesses
  • Check the solutions from explanations in each question
  • Get prompt answers & support from the instructor within 24 hours!

There are lots of ITIL Foundation Exam materials to study for the ITIL Foundation exam. However, there are only a few ITIL Foundation sample exam providers. With the realistic ITIL Foundation exams in this course, you will be able to evaluate your readiness for the real exam. It is recommended to schedule your real ITIL Foundation Exam if you answer 65% or more of the questions (26 questions) in the realistic exams correctly.

This course provides 400 Realistic ITIL Foundation Exam Questions in 10 Realistic Exams

Besides realistic ITIL Foundation Exams, this course contains high-level overview of following ITIL Service Lifecycle stages as well:

  • Service Strategy
  • Service Design
  • Service Transition
  • Service Operation
  • Continual Service Improvement (CSI)
Note that, if you are PMP already, this course provides 12 PDUs in Category B: Continuing Education.


Disclaimer: "ITIL®" is a registered trademark of AXELOS. And this training is delivered by an accredited ITIL education provider.
title: ITIL® Foundation: 10 Full Realistic ITIL® Foundation Exams
